inn1.comm: pitches it up on a length outside off and the batsman lets it go
back of a length and seaming away and he shoulders arms
chases one with no footwork at all, wafting at the ball as it sits up off a length and carries at a good height to Dhoni
first bat on ball, as Tamim pushes at one a bit fuller on off stump
leans into a drive and miscues the shot, the ball doesn't carry to mid-off, he was not to the pitch and went hard at the ball
pitches on a length and he drives hard to short cover who does well
drives a full ball without much footwork and the late movement draws an inside edge onto his front boot, that was a very airy drive away from the body by Kayes
temps the drive again with a wider delivery but no dice
better length from Sree, not as full and it makes Kayes shoulder arms
pitches on a length but its too wide, so Kayes flays the bat on ball and slices a boundary over cover-point

see-ball-will-hit. Its a rather simple philosophy and at the moment its working for Kayes, who again sees room on offer and just throws the bat out, again slashing the ball over the off-side for four .. just too much width from Sreesanth
better ball, short of a length and angling in, but he's overstepped, so while this time Kayes opts to shoulder arms, he can do something more aggressive against the free hit
well he tries to belt it but the ball hurries onto him and he's in no real position to pull, and the top edge goes nowhere far and drops in between the stumps and midwicket
well who didn't see that one coming? Tyagi angles the length delivery across off stump and Kayes reaches out and slashes it in the air to the point fielder
impressive shot first up, flicks a full ball on off stump to midwicket
short of a length on off stump and Ashraful defends
shoulders arms to another good delivery just outside off
takes a half step down the track and goes fishing and gets beaten
sees this one off too and Tyagi finishes with two maidens
short ball and he mistimes the pull to square leg
beaten! Hits a good length and sits up and beats the bat, well bowled
fuller, he gets forward and keeps it out this time
makes room and charges out, flaying the bat at a wider and shorter ball and gets a thick outside edge down to the vacant third man region
loose shot! Ashraful again hops back to try and create room to go over the top but this ball is fuller and the booming drive results in an inside edge off his boots onto the base of off stump
short of a length, he looks to work it away as he hops back but gets a leading edge along the ground to the off side
good shot but he can't get four, does well to get over the slightly short ball on off stump and cuts down into the ground, Kohli fumbles at backward point due to the odd bounce and allows a single
good length half a foot outside off, some cut, he shoulders arms
short ball gets some extra bounce and slides into the body, Raqibul fends it off with one hand just wide of square leg for a single, the sweeper cuts it off
just back of a length on off stump and he makes room but ends up chopping a cramped cut shot into the ground in front of Kohli
hops up and turns the ball off leg stump to midwicket
loud appeal but not out, pitches full just outside leg stump and hits the pad as Tamim tries to on-drive, there's also a sound of some wood on it and so Taufel says no
hits a good length on middle and off and he defends
short ball over off and middle, 134ks, and he ducks under it
good length on middle and off, no movement but he again defends
fuller ball, which Raqibul drives well but straight to cover
pulls back the length this time, pitching short of a length on off with a hint of shape, Raqibul goes back and defends and gets an inside edge
this time he punches a pleasing drive to extra cover and calls early, Nehra runs around from mid-off and does the fielding
ah, inside edge again, as Tyagi pitches full and Raqibul hesitantly pokes at it, then the ball rolls to square leg
short ball, 131ks, down the pads, he looks to turn it away but the ball rides up off his thigh pad to midwicket
good length this time and he drops his head while defending
another good length ball on middle and off which he defends
back of a length on middle and leg and he turns it to square leg
short ball into the body, 129.5ks, Raqibul hops up and plays it down to midwicket

oversteps, so a no-ball, short of a length outside off and Tamim chops it down to backward point, another free hit coming up, a very tight call however on replays, Sree won't like that at all and he has a word with the umpire
bangs it short outside off, Tamim pulls and gets a thick top edge that is taken at backward point but it doesn't count
good shot, just picks it up ala Michael Vaughan, one leg up as he swats the short ball over midwicket, pleasing little punch from Raqibul
short again, this one down the stumps, he again goes for the pull but this time gets an inside edge into the gap at square leg, so just two for Raqibul
ah, loose shot but safe, as he slices a wide length delivery in the air safely wide of backward point
back of a length just outside off and Tamim defends back to Sree

very loud and prolonged appeal from Sreesanth, as the fuller ball angles back in and hits the front leg with Tamim late on the flick, but there is no reaction from the umpire ... on replays and to the naked eye it looked a very good appeal, struck him in front of about leg stump ... yes, that looked out indeed so Sree has reason to feel robbed
gets back and works the ball to the fielder
and again, drags back the length and he plays it away
back of a length and he gets back in line to play it back
lucky! Short ball, he pulls and makes a mess of it but the ball goes over all the fielders for four
that is a much better shot, as Raqibul gets into position and pulls a short ball over midwicket
change of pace and length, pitches fuller and he defends to cover
no slip and that's four to Tamim! Just flashes at a length ball very hard and gets a thick outside edge down to the ropes
hurries onto him and he's nearly cut in half by the sharp movement off a length, he does not move his feet and somehow manages to chop the bat down on ball
good length and it cuts back again, this time Tamim defends well
slides down leg stump, he looks to flick but the ball brushes his pads
offers some room and Raqibul waits before cutting the ball down but he picks out the fielder
pitches safely outside leg stump and Raqibil turns it around the corner
oversteps and Tamim slams the no-ball, pitched up, superbly down over mid-on, so that is a lovely shot to get into groove ahead of the third free hit off Sree
no surprises that the result is a third short ball, and Tamim hangs back and pulls very well into the gap at midwicket to get the fans cheering
short ball sits up nicely but he gets inside the line and works it to square
pitches on a good length, Tamim dabs the ball into the covers
nice tidy line and length, no room, middle and off, defended back
full just outside leg stump, slower ball, Tamim looks to chip it over midwicket but mistimes it with an inside edge and the ball pops up and drops in front of the catcher
much slower out the back of the hand, just 96ks, pitches fuller and he gets forward to patiently defend
full on the pads, mistimes the flick towards square leg and sets off
good length on middle and off, hint of shape back in, pushed to cover
back of a length outside off and he drives on the rise and away from the body, its in the air momentarily but falls short of the man at cover
short ball, 136ks, sails over and he pulls out of the hook shot
tries to heave a length ball over midwicket but cannot time it to save his life and the ball rolls back toward Nehra
good length outside off, stays very low however and sneaks under the bat of a very wafty type of shot from Raqibul
good length outside off and he defends it back
fuller ball angles away and he chases with a booming drive, streakily slicing it off the edge down toward backward point, safely

good ball, slants back in off a length and he gets an inside edge looking to work it to midwicket, the ball ball drops outside off and Tamim bolts out, Raqibul hesitates as Dhoni runs in to collect but they pinch the single in the end
wild shot, just stands there and swats the length ball over cover, its in the air but drops well short of Gambhir out in the deep
fuller in length and Raqibul pats it back
full on leg stump, 135ks, nicely whipped out to deep midwicket
pitches down the pads, he gets a small leading edge on the attempted nudge but for the umpteenth time the ball does not carry to a catcher

stupid shot and well taken by Tyagi at mid-off! Tamim combusts again, coming onto the front foot to try and smash the ball over the infield, but its not full enough and gets big on him and Tyagi falls to his left while running from mid-off to take the catch
short ball to welcome him and he sees it off
back of a length outside off and he defends it watchfully
marginally fuller in length and he covers off while dabbing it point
gets back and across again to pat back a short of a length ball
tosses up a legbreak on middle and off and Raqibul defends
another turning delivery and he gets over it, pushing to cover
well flighted ball on middle and leg, good dip, defended to cover
good stuff, slower ball drifts across from middle and leg and draws the edge as Raqibul pushes out in front of his pads but it falls short and runs past slip
shorter ball, he gets back and steers it past backward point
fuller ball floated up on middle and off and he pats it back
good length on middle and off, he pushes it back with a straight bat
hits a good length and he defends
short ball down the leg stump, Shakib goes for the pull to the slanting delivery but cannot connect
hops back to this one and pushes it back past Nehra, calling for the single, Raina from midwicket underarms it and just misses
leans in and pushes the ball on the rise to Raina at cover
short of a length and angling in and Raqibul defends to Raina
comes onto the front foot and pushes back a length delivery
tossed up outside off, he gets across and laps it to square leg, Karthik from slips gives chase
ah, turn and bounce! Flighted up, pitches outside leg and rips across, gets the edge but falls well safe of any catcher
lovely bowling from Mishra, flighted on middle and leg, on a teasing length, Raqibul comes out and shapes to on-drive but has to adjust and push to cover
quicker ball, this time he gets to the pitch and drives to extra cover
tossed up on off stump and Shakib defends
skips out, Mishra bowls it fuller and faster, Shakib clips from outside off into the gap at midwicket
flat on the stumps, starts to angle across, Shakib works it to midwicket
fuller ball, off stump, he gets back and defends it this time
starts to move across, so Yuvraj fires it flat outside off

oh what thinking, and full credit to Yuvraj! He bowls it flat and wide, Shakib punches back down the track, Yuvraj fields between his legs and then smartly flicks the ball between them onto the base of the stumps with Raqibul well short of the crease
tossed up and defended
flatter and wider ball outside off, Shakib chases and misses
no turn, too wide, very far down leg stump
flighted on middle and leg, some turn, patted to the leg side
more turn and bounce from leg, he gets over the ball and works it away
slower ball out the back of the hands, pitches on a length and he defends
tossed up on middle and leg and he defends
flights it wider, he comes forward and drives to cover
quicker ball to end the over, middle and off, driven back to Mishra
punched back to Yuvraj
much slower and fuller, Shakib tries to on-drive but mistimes it back
too short and wide and he hammers well and threads the gap at cover
tosses it up this time and Shakib drives straight to cover
too flat again, he gets back into position and punches nicely to mid-off where Jadeja runs and slides but deflects the ball off his boots for one more
comes out and takes it on the full, driving down to Jadeja again
flights it outside off, the faster one, pretty wide and he slashes hard into the gap behind point out to third man where Gambhir dives in vain
pulls a short ball through square leg out to Yuvraj in the deep
slower ball tossed up on a length and he defends it back
good ball, flighted on middle and off, the googly, and he stabs at it
defends it back watchfully
shuffles and turns the googly off his stumps toward square leg
pitches in line and drifts down leg stump, not as much turn as expected, he is late on the shot and Dhoni appeals even as Yuvraj pulls out of his shout
turns from middle to leg and he shuffles to work away a single
good shot from Shakib, leaning into a full and wide ball and driving it on the volley wide of Jadeja at mid-off
flatter ball on middle and leg, played back to Yuvraj
angles it across Shakib who drives and edges in the air but the ball does not carry to Karthik at gully
tossed up on middle and leg and Shakib drives out to long-on
tossed up, he uses his feet and punches a drive to mid-off
flatter ball, backs away and forces it to cover
more air on this one, Shakib skips out and punches to long-on
googly on middle and leg, worked to midwicket this time
some turn, but its spinning away so he drives into the off side
good shot, takes a step out and clears midwicket by a long way
flat and short, Shakib slashes hard but Karthik runs around and intercepts to save four, very well done
tossed up and pushed to cover for a single
tossed up on middle and leg, defended against the turn
gets on top of the ball and turns it to square leg
tossed up on a length, driven down to long-off for one more

gone! Yuvraj knows Mushfiqur is playing his shots to he slows the pace and flights it on a length and the batsman just chips the ball to Raina at cover, failing to keep it down, a very soft sort of dismissal
well bowled! Drifts it away from Shakib, who drives with a big gap and gets beaten
tossed up and he defends this time
uses his feet and works the ball to square leg for one
legbreak on off stump, watchfully played
fuller ball, quicker too, dips sharply and he jams it out in time
slower one, pitches middle and leg, he defends it back
comes forward and drives, Yuvraj moves across and cuts it off
reaches out this time and drives wide of mid-off for a single
tossed up and slides down the pads for a wide
tossed up and defended
a bit too short outside off and he cuts it down wide of point
hits a length and he plays it to the fielders
on the pads and turning down, worked away for a single
spins in from outside off, he shuffles and nudges it fine, Dhoni fields
starts to come out, Mishra fires it in and draws a defensive
flatter ball on a length, he stands tall and punches it back to Mishra
fuller ball, the googly, Shakib comes forward and pushes to extra cover
not to the pitch of this wider one but carries on with the uppish drive, hit in the air momentarily but into the gap at extra cover
tosses up the dipping leg break on off stump and he defends
spins away from him but he uses his feet and drives down the ground
fuller ball and he defends to cover
reaches out and drives a single to extra cover
too flat and Shakib has plenty of time to go back and punch it away
no turn, he works it from middle and leg to midwicket
spins in from middle stump, Mahmudullah turns it away
goes back again and punches the ball down to long-off with ease
slower ball, Mahmudullah looks to work it fine but mistimes the shot
spins down the pads and this time Mahmudullah brushes it fine
drifts in again, he uses the wrists to turn it away
flatter ball on a length, punched back, Jadeja moves across to collect
fractionally short outside off, Shakib is eager to pounce and biffs it between mid-on and midwicket, running hard
back of a length outside off, Shakib stands up and punches to point
slower ball on a length, Mahmudullah opens the face and steers to point
reaches out and steers another length ball, Jadeja cut it off at point
ah, unlucky for Nehra, who bounces and Mahmudullah is surprised, getting a top edge on the loose pull way over Dhoni
better shot from Mahmudullah, who dances out and lofts the fuller ball well over mid-off for four more
back of a length, he stands back and pushes the ball to cover
comes forward and punches pleasingly to mid-off for one
slower ball outside off stump, he looks to paddle but can't time it well
good ball, gets some turn from middle and off, dabbed to cover
spinning away from Shakib, who steers it uneasily to backward point
too short, Mahmudullah stands tall and punches to extra cover
comes out and punches it to the off side, Jadeja runs across
stays low while pitching on middle and leg but Mahmudullah rolls the wrists and picks the gap at square leg
short of a length, Shakib stays in line and pushes to cover
comes onto the front foot and opens the face, steering a length ball to third man for an easy and safe single
good length just outside off, Mahmudullah pushes it to cover
some shape away  this time as Nehra pulls back the length, Mahmudullah is forced to push at it and does well to play it down in front of point
good stuff from Nehra, hitting the seam on a length, Mahmudullah, defends
tossed up to Shakib who pushes off the front foot to cover
straighter ball, patted back to the bowler
played back again, Jadeja moves to his right to stop
flatter, he moves back and mows it to midwicket
drifts in and he knocks it to the leg side
slower ball, no turn, Mahmudullah is early into the drive
full outside off and he drives the ball down to long-off for one
spins away, he waits for the turn and then dabs to point
comes forward and then waits for turn, steering to backward point
flatter arm ball, Mahmudullah stands back and punches to cover
short ball, quicker too, he mistimes the cramped pull shot back
comes forward and stabs at a fuller ball on off stump
stands back and punches a short ball to the man at cover
too straight, no turn, Mahmudullah shuffles and works it away nicely
good ball, middle and off, watchfully defended
gets over the ball again and blocks
some turn away from middle and off, Mahmudullah pushes it away
quicker ball, spins back in, Mahmudullah stabs at it with a gap between bat and pad and survives with an inside edge between his legs
too flat and he gets back and bunts it wide of midwicket
slower and fuller, Mahmudullah defends down to point
some turn this time, Mahmudullah pushes to cover
slides in from middle and leg and he works it to midwicket
tossed up on a length and he pushes to cover
beats everyone! Pushes it in quicker, beats him in the air and draws a little nick as it passes by but Dhoni drops it and then fluffs the stumping too
comes forward and defends
comes out and drives past the infield for two
reaches out and drives it
pitches outside leg, sweeps to square leg
tossed up and he defends it back
slower ball just outside off, Shakib heaves and inside-edges
uses his feet to get to the pitch and drives down the ground
slower ball drifts across and beats the loose shot away from the body
quicker ball, Shakib comes out and drives straight
pitches outside leg and drifts in, he uses his feet and punches it back
again he looks to on-drive a single but mistimes it back to Yuvraj
too short and wide and he spanks it past mid-off out to Jadeja
tossed up, some turn, pushed back
straighter ball, worked past square leg
comes out, Jadeja fires it, Shakib steers the ball into the covers
massive shot! Sweetly struck by the captain, slogging from outside off stump for a big six over midwicket
well played, his fifty comes up with an easy nudge off the pads
drives from back in the crease and inside-edges onto the boot
lands outside off and he drives down to mid-off
slow through the air, he punches it down to point
tossed up and he goes for the loft, he checks his shot to long-off
very slow through the air, keeps low and he tucks it down to short fine
fires it quicker he jams it out to long-on
tries to push a single to cover but is sent back
tries to club it away down to long-on but mistimes it and the ball drops well in front of the fielder
short of a length outside off and he cuts to square third man
slower delivery punched to Tyagi at sweeper cover
good yorker close to the leg stump and well squeezed out to deep square leg
drops it towards cover and tells his partner to stay back
that's a cracker of a square cut, short and wide and slapped with intent well wide of square third man
very poor ball and spanked away, short outside off, fetches it and clubs it over midwicket
the googly, softly nudges it down to midwicket
slow off the air and off the pitch, rocks back and taps it to sweeper cover
gets on his knee and sweeps to deep square leg
quicker through the air and pushed to long-on
hits the deck hard and tries to hook it away but the top edge sails over Nehra's head
good length outside off and pushed down to third man
gives him width outside off and he slaps it away over cover, Karthik stops it with one hand at the boundary
short outside off and cut to point
tossed on middle and leg and pushed to mid-on
stays back and punches it to mid-off
stays back and punches it to cover
gives it a lot of air, he steps down the track and drives hard to mid-off
Shakib's out there to smack it, he seizes on a short of a length delivery, fetches it from off stump and heaves it over midwicket
tries to scoop it over the keeper but he moves across a bit too early, misses it outside off
full outside off and crashed straight to cover
picked the gap very well, drops it short and he fetches it from outside off this time and pulls it down to midwicket, bisects 2 fielders in the deep
he pulls off the scoop this time, moves across his stumps, paddles it high over short fine leg, supreme confidence there
some respite for Tyagi, Shakib swings at a short delivery and misses
lands outside leg and traps him on the pads, it rolls to the on side

attempts the scoop but it leads to a very silly dismissal in the end, the ball came on a bit slower than he expected, moved right across his stumps to scoop it over the keeper but ended up lobbing it tamely to Dhoni
on the pads and clipped away down to deep square leg
poor ball and good shot, it's a slow short ball, he gets on top of the bounce and upper cuts it over backward point
comes round the wicket and nearly feathers an edge to the keeper
tossed up on the off stump, he backs away and lofts him inside out over cover
comes round the wicket, Mahmudullah gets on his knee and sweeps hard and firm to fine leg, well fielded by Jadeja, that's another exciting fifty by Mahmudullah
goes back and punches it to cover
drops it short and wide outside leg, he shapes to pull but misses
tossed up on middle and off from round the wicket, Mahmudullah stays at the wicket, clears his back leg and whacks it over long-on, classic shot
short and wide outside leg, terrible bowling
full outside off and driven to long-off
comes round the wicket, he drops it in front of short mid-off and sets off

Dropped, outside edge but well stopped by Dhoni, he moved to his left on seeing the batsman backing away, the outside edge nearly took the leg stump and just about carried to Dhoni, he could have taken it
shortish and pulled firmly down to deep square leg
comes round the wicket, nudged to the on side
tries to heave it away but the ball drops to midwicket
tries to tuck it to the on side, he drops it towards short cover
makes a bit of room but sreesanth follows him, knocks it down to short midwicket
fires it full outside off and he squeezes it out to deep extra cover
bowls it short on the off stump and Naeem has a wils slash at it and misses
goes for the wild hit and he mistimes it to midwicket
middle and leg, he makes room and plays a short arm pull down to long leg
digs it in short on seeing him advance, Mahmudullah swishes but fails to make contact, that ends a very good over
comes round the wicket and fires it full outside off, makes room, swings and misses
clean hit, pitched up on middle and off, he makes room, clears the back leg and crashes it over deep midwicket
comes over the wicket, makes room to a short ball and slaps it square of the wicket on the off side, beats backward point
makes room and crashes a full delivery straight to cover
good yorker length delivery, he squeezes it out to long-on
full on middle, he makes room and squeezes it out to cover point

inn2.comm: gives him width straight up, he rocks back and chops it wide of backward point, checks his shot
cramps him up for room, the ball comes on very slowly and he chops it wide of slip
on the pads and he clips him down to fine leg
teases him with the swing, tries to angle it away to third man but misses it
gets well forward and pushes it down to cover point
swings it away again and he opens the face of the bat and angles it to third man
drifts on the body and he deflects it off his body down to fine leg
wide and not too much bounce, he manages to cut it very easily square of the wicket on the off side and bisect the gap between cover and point
angled on the body and he works it on its way down to fine leg
down the leg side and he tries to tickle it down to fine leg
full on the pads and he knocks it back to the bowler
nudges it to deep square leg, he pushes hard for the second run and the keeper whips off the bails but he's safe
stays behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler
angles it towards the body and he clips it wide of square leg and takes two very easily
stays back and punches it back towards mid-on
gives him width and he deliberately slashes it in the air towards third man, beats slip
on middle and leg and easily nudged away to fine leg, completes two easily again
awesome timing, angled on the pads and he gently clips it away past the diving midwicket fielder, he chases it but the ball speeds away
on the body and nudged away again to the on side
good delivery, on the stumps and defended solidly
full on the pads and clipped away to deep square leg
short and wide and bashed away, he stays beside the line, rolls his wrists and cuts wide of the covers
driven nicely off the front foot and Tamim does well to dive to his left and cut it off
just a bit of width outside off, he chops it wide of point and tells karthik to head back for the second run
chopped down to the ground, the fielder at point leaps up and stops it
comes back into him, he cuts very close to the body and angles it to third man
stays back and nudges it down to square leg
stays back and punches it down to mid-on
goes back and clips him down to deep square leg
stays back and pushes him down to mid-on
tries to clip it away to the on side but Mahmudullah falls to his left at short midwicket and saves a few runs
driven firmly down the pitch and well intercepted by Shakib at mid-on
shapes to cut but the ball comes back in late, he ends up chopping it down
nice line and length outside off and defended solidly to the offside
defended close to the pads and there's a thick inside edge, stifled appeal
bowls a tight line again, karthik is solid in defense
full outside off and he mistimes the drive back to the bowler, good over by Shafiul, it's a maiden
shuffles across his stumps and clips him down to deep square leg
bowls it nice and tight on the stumps, gets behind the line and defends
gives him width and he open the face of the bat and angles it to third man
flicks it from outside off and calls quickly for the second run, Karthik decides against it and wisely so
nudges the slower ball down to short fine leg and sets off but Gambhir sends him back
tries to cheekily run it down to third man but the ball skids through and beats the edge
good length on middle and leg and tapped back to the bowler
good length on middle and off, he stays back and punches it back to the bowler, this is a nice restrictive line
shows urgency by coming down the pitch, the ball drifts towards the pads and Gambhir whips it to fine leg
excellent delivery, beats the outside edge, Gambhir was beaten for pace there, tries to dab it to third man
stays back and defends back to the bowler
short of a length on the pads, the ball clips his body and rolls away
outside off and he opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
good length on middle, he shuffles across and clips him down to deep square leg
stays back and punches it down to mid-off  for a quick single
gets across and flicks it down to short fine leg, very good effort by Shafiul to keep it to a single
gets forward and drives him down to cover
full on the off stump and driven to mid-off
short delivery and he shapes to pull but checks his shot and places it to square leg
good shot, gives him width outside off, he reaches out and times the cut very well past backward point and cover
hits the deck hard and bends down to evade the bouncer
bowls a tight line on the off stump, Karthik gets forward and defends solidly
gets in position too early to pull and he ends up mistiming it to square leg, in the air but nobody there
starts the powerplay with a six over deep midwicket, he feasts on a half tracker and clubs it away
tossed up on middle and leg, defended
tossed up on middle and defended
goes back and clips him down to short fine leg for a quick single
full on the pads and he clips him down to square leg
full on the off stump and defended to mid-off
full on off and middle and pushed towards mid-on
skids through outside the off stump, he tries to run it down towards third man and nearly edges it
shuffles and clips it up in the air over square leg, there's protection in the deep
hits the deck hard and he ducks under that bouncer

Appeal Karthik shapes to pull but the ball doesn't bounce as much, there was a sound and Mushfiqur took it inches off the ground, Taufel consults his colleague and they refer it to the third umpire, he confirms that it was indeed a clean catch, it took a while but the correct decision was made
stays behind the line and defends nicely back to the bowler
comes round the wicket, stays back and whips it to the on side
slow off the pitch and punched down to mid-on
rocks back and chops it down to cover
stays at the crease and pushes it down to cover
full on the pads and pushed down to mid-on
tossed up outside off, gets forward and drives to cover
short and wide and he slaps it hard towards point, Ashraful dives and it beats him, Rasel dives at third man and he too cannot cut it off
he's frustrated with himself for drifting down the leg side, easily tickled away to fine leg
he was shaping to shoulder arms but the ball took the edge and beat the huge gap between keeper and slip, lucky one for Gambhir
drifts on the body and hurries onto him, he tries to nudge it away but the ball rolls to the on side
gets high on him and he defends to the off side
stays behind the line and defends down the pitch
gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
pushes it towards mid-on and sets off quickly
goes back, makes use of the width and slaps it hard down to deep point, Shafiul dives at the boundary but the ball dribbles past him
gets well forward and defends to cover
stays back and knocks it back to the bowler
chips down the track and pushes it down to deep midwicket
ah, big spin back in from outside off as Gambhir goes back and exposes all the sticks, but he plays it well off the back foot to cover
fuller ball and he comes forward, bat and pad together, to block

bowled him for turn! Gambhir dances out looking to heave that over midwicket but he's beaten in flight and nowhere near the pitch of the ball, which spins back in and disturbs the sticks, prompting massive celebrations from Naeem
tossed up and he comes forward to keep it out
flatter ball spin back in and he gets off the mark with a tickle
spins into the right-hander, who gets across and flicks to midwicket
flighted up on the stumps, Kohli plays out in front of his pads to midwicket
spins back in, shorter ball, pushed off the back foot to cover
arm ball, well down the pads, flicked out to deep fine leg
tossed up, makes room and drives inside out to cover
on the stumps, worked out to the leg side
shot of a man in form, up goes the back leg as Kohli drives that back straight down past Shakib, taking it from middle and leg and playing very hard
arm ball on middle and leg, turned off the front pad to midwicket
tossed up and he whips it from off stump to deep midwicket
fuller ball on middle and leg and he stabs it back in defence
nicely tossed up, gets some overspin, but its too straight and there's a muted appeal as Yuvraj is late on the flick
pushes forward and defends
shorter in length, he goes back and punches the ball to cover
aye, turn and bounce, as the ball spins back in and then surprises Kohli as he works to shape it to leg, drawing an edge safely down to third man
misfield gets him four more, as he sees the smallest bit of room and backs away to bring the bat down firmly, slicing it through a diving point fielder
flighted into Kohli who comes out and works the ball to midwicket
nice length to get Yuvraj defending while prodding forward
fuller and flatter and he whips it from outside off past Shakib
flights it on middle and off to get Kohli watchfully defending to cover
well bowled, teasing length and some turn gets him defending
spins away this time and he stretches forward, then angles the bat to run the ball fine
flatter ball, Kohli stands back and punches it to midwicket
spins back in and Yuvraj stabs at it, the ball rolls to leg and he sends back an eager Kohli
continues to keep Yuvraj quite, making him come out and block
similar line and length, tossed up make him stride forward
down the pads and he gets a faint tickle on it, short fine leg dives
flights it well outside off to draw a booming drive away from the body, but there's no one near the ring so he gets off the strike
flatter ball speared in, turned to square leg and sends him back
goes back and knocks the ball wide of midwicket, Ashraful runs after it and hauls it back nicely in the deep
loopy full delivery, much slower, dips outside off as Yuvraj sets out and then is nearly beaten so he angles the bat down on ball, squirting it past point
flatter length and Kohli goes back to bunt it past square leg
flat on the stumps, easy pickings, goes back and drives to long-on
slides down the pads, good turn but too fine a line, Yuvraj cannot get bat on ball and leg byes are the signal
slower ball, teasing too, he flirts with a cut and fails to connect
this time he drives off the front foot, reaching out and going past extra cover
tries a big aerial whip to one sliding into middle and leg but ends up inside-edging the ball to short third man
tossed up wider, he uses his feet and drives on the up to mid-off
reaches out and drives into the covers
flat ball way down the pads, he gets a brush and picks up four
tossed up down the pads again and this time Kohli clips to deep square
shorter in length, some turn, he covers off and defends
flights it wider this time and he plays an expansive drive to deep cover
well tossed up to invite the shot and he drives from middle and leg to deep cover
turns back in but the line is just too straight, so Kohli works back and bunts the ball to midwicket
turn and bounce from middle and off, he stretches forward to block
just a punch to give him some confidence, this ball is not as full and he drives it very powerfully into the gap at cover

gone this time, and Naeem gets a second! This time he holds back the length and gets the ball to straighten from middle and leg, Yuvraj plays down the wrong line and is just struck in front of about middle stump, looking to drive through the midwicket area
goes back and turns the flatter ball to square leg
tossed up outside off, some turn, Kohli dabs the ball to point
flat outside off, no turn, he makes room and slashes past point
spins away, but Kohli rides the bounce and pushes past cover
tossed up and Dhoni drives but straight to the man at cover
twirls a flatter ball just past cover, mid-off does the fielding
arm ball on middle and leg and this time he defends
pushes him onto the back foot, the ball gets some turn but he manages to defend it to the off side
spins back in and Dhoni eases it off his legs for a single
token Kohli shot, eager to spot the length and goes back to bunt the ball wide of midwicket
goes back and drives again but straight back to the bowler
better length, slower ball too and he defends watchfully
normal service resumed, as Naeem bowls short of a length and Kohli hangs back before knocking the ball down the ground
pushes off the front foot to cover and sends Kohli back
down the pads, worked straight to the man at midwicket
this time he plays it much finer and brings long leg into play
short ball, Dhoni goes back and whacks it down to long-off
slower ball on middle and leg, makes room and drives to cover
straighter ball, some turn but Dhoni works the wrists to get one
spins back in to Kohli who also goes back and then angles the bat to work the ball toward backward point
moves back to biff a short ball to mid-on and beyond but ends up dragging the ball to the fielder
fuller in length and he reaches out to drive it to extra cover, sets off and just makes it as the fielder's throw is wide
goes back and turns the ball away for two more
the runs keep flowing for Kohli, who works this ball off his pads to raise his fifth ODI fifty-plus score in the last six innings, well played kid
comes forward and drives the ball cover
goes back to try and cut a short ball, gets an inside edge, runs hard, there's a fumble and so Dhoni urges Kohli on for the second and they get it with ease
comes forward and defends this time
ah, close! Exposes the sticks and looks to cut, the ball spins and stays low and he survives with an inside edge onto his toes
stands his crease and pushes the ball to extra cover
goes back and pushes the ball to cover again
sees some room and works the ball out to deep cover
spins back this time off a fuller length, Kohli goes back and opens the face to guide the ball square on the off side
tossed up on off stump and Dhoni squirts it to cover-point
quicker ball down the pads, looks to glance but can't time it
nice wristy shot, allows the ball come on and works it past midwicket
drifts back in, Dhoni reaches out and pushes it to cover
uses his feet to come out and push the ball past short cover, mid-off runs hard in chase and slides over the ropes in vain
short and wide, deliberately cut in front of square to beat sweeper cover, who gives up the chase near the end to come in second place
tossed up on leg stump, another nice wristy shot to deep square
slides down the pads, he has all the time to work it away, runs hard and gets three
too straight and he eases it off his pads for one more
slower ball, middle and leg, opts to pat it back this time
waits for turn, there isn't any, so he dabs it into the covers
driven off the front foot to cover for a quick single
short ball, sits up outside off and wide called for height
fuller ball, middle and off, he reaches out and turns it across the line and even though it is not timed to perfection Dhoni picks the gap between midwicket and mid-on
comes in again and he turns it away for one more
another big drive results in an inside edge across the line
short of a length this time and Kohli forces it between cover and point
tries a short ball but Kohli hops across his sticks and whips it out to deep backward square leg
slashes this one off the front foot but point dives to intercept
quicker through the air and softly nudged to the on side
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
goes back and pushes it wide of cover
quicker through the air and pushed to midwicket
goes back and forces it down to short fine leg, the ball skidded through, that;s the 50 stand
mistimed back to the bowler
full outside off and driven firmly towards mid-off
that's a cracker of an off drive, half volley outside off and he leans forward and pierces the gap between mid-off and cover
dropped with soft hands towards short cover and sets off very quickly
he reaches out to spank a slower ball but misses it completely
bowls him the slower ball, it;s short and he pulls it down to fine leg
drops it towards point and tells his partner to stay back
the ball skids through and clips his pads, outside the line of leg
tucked away to the on side
close call for Dhoni, the ball is tucked to short fine leg, Dhoni sets off and then scampers back, the throw is wide at the bowler's end
punched wide of cover point
punched straight to cover
four more, bangs it in short, he gets on top of the bounce and pulls wide of square leg
good length outside off and punched to sweeper cover
short outside off, he rides the bounce and flashes it wide and hard past the keeper, the third man fielder dives in vain

direct hit! He squirts a slower ball towards mid-on and sets off, Ashraful hits the target and Dhoni just manages to make his ground, however he thinks he's gone and hits his pads in frustration, it goes upstairs and replays confirm he's safe, only just
full on the off stump and driven down to mid-off
comes back in and slices him in half, creeps past the inside edge
soft dismissal for Dhoni, he chips down the track to try and slam him over the infield but doesn't get the desired elevation, ends up chipping it to Kayes at mid-on
tossed up on middle and leg, he defends to the bowler
chips down the track and checks his shot, defends
drops it short and wide outside off, he rocks back and slaps it wide of extra cover
the straighter one, he goes back and punches it back to the bowler
comes down the pitch and tries to clear long-on but mistimes it, mid-on runs back and pulls it back
played it with his eyes shut almost, short and on the off stump, goes back and punches it past the big gap between mid-off and cover
short of a length and he pulls along the ground to the on side
tossed up outside off and driven down to mid-off
makes a bit of room and pushes it towards mid-off
tries to bludgeon it past midwicket but mistimes it
tossed up just wide down the leg side and wide called
gets beside the line and punches it down to sweeper cover
tossed up on leg and pushed through the line to long-on
full outside off and he reaches out and drives to deep extra cover
slow through the air and tapped towards cover, Raina sets off but heads back
tries to slash it past short third man but the fielder intercepts it
gets in position to sweep but the ball clips his pads and lobs wide of the keeper
goes back and punches it wide of point
drifts on the pads and he works him away down to fine leg
bowls him the slower bouncer and he checks the pull shot, places it to deep square leg
short of a length outside off, he clubs it straight to mid-on
stays back and clips it down to midwicket
Dropped by Ashraful, he should have taken that, Kohli pulls it straight to deep midwicket, Ashraful had it covered though and cupped his hands in front of his face
pushed straight to point
another life for Kohli! Comes down the pitch to loft, misses it and Rahim fails to gather it, would have been an easy stumping
stays back and clips it to square leg

Dropped and it's Ashraful again! Oh dear! Raina pulls a short delivery and aims to clear deep midwicket, Ash had to run across to his right and he had it covered, dropped it on the dive, is it the lights or is it slightly misty out there? Could be the dew
reaches out and drives very firmly down to wide long-off
down the leg side and pulled to fine leg
slower ball and gently dabbed wide of first slip
superb pull, Rasel hits the deck hard and Kohli meets the ball in front of his face and pulls, keeps it down and finds the gap at deep square leg
punched down to mid-on
full outside off and driven hard and firm straight to sweeper cover, Kohli wanted the second I think
slower ball and cut down to deep point
yet another life for Kohli! It's not Ashraful this time! Kohli gets a thick top edge as hr tries to whip it over midwicket, the ball drops in the middle of nowhere wide of mid-on
full on the leg stump and driven to mid-on
rocks back and slaps it to sweeper cover
Raina angles it down to third man and immediately calls for 2. How about a hundred for Kohli please?
full on the off stump and pushed to long-on
on 98 now! Comes down the pitch and slams it down the ground to long-off
doesn't get more satisfying than that - a hundred and a win! Comes down the pitch and mistimes the on drive but still finds the big gap between mid-on and midwicket, the fielders were up
